availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John B. Rawlings (Pendleton County, Kentucky, merchant and farmer)

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, merchant and farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Jane Whitson Rawlings on September 29, 1856. Father of Jasper W. Rawlings, N. J. Rawlings, J. N. Rawlings, K. H. Rawlings, M. E. Rawlings, and E. D. Rawlings. Merchant in Pendleton County in 1860. Farmer in Pendleton County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Pendleton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Falmouth, p. 3.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Falmouth, p. 1.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Falmouth, p. 4.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Pendleton County Marriages, Film #000272801.
